Description: Rim sherd of Chian Mature Animal Style pottery heavy chalice; white slip; interior: reserved band at rim, glazed streaky black below; part of lotus-palmette and rosette in added white outline with added red centre; exterior: chequer pattern around rim, above maeander band; surface worn below.
Bibliographic references: Lemos 1991 / Archaic Pottery of Chios. The Decorated Styles (p. 262, no. 539)
Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GD.1549) (phase 2)
